result.execSummary:
The defendant Andrew N. Mock was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Sex Registry Violation, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 301.45(6)(a)1.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Concurrent with: 14CM1405, 14CM1774 and revocation sentences currently being served.

superMiscConds.notes: No objection to having contact with victim, S.M., while in prison and ES.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

Case called:  11:04 am
Includes 14CM1405, 14CF876, 14CM1774.
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Lesli Pluster:
Defendant appears in custody and with Atty Dana Norgard;
VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves to:
14CM1405:
Ct. 2 (Disorderly Conduct-Repeater-DA)>>DRI.
COURT GRANTS ABOVE.

PLEA: 
14CM1405:
Ct. 1 (Battery-Repeater-DA)>>NO CONTEST.

14CF876:
Ct. 1 (Sex Registry Violation)>>NO CONTEST.

14CM1774: 
Ct. 1 (Theft-Movable Property-Repeater)>>NO CONTEST.

Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: 
14CM1405:
Ct. 1 (Battery-Repeater-DA)>> 2 years WSPS - 1 year IC and 1 year ES. To run concurrent to each other and to the recvocation sentences currently being served. CONDITIONS: Court Costs. No objection to having contact with Victim S.M. while in prison and on ES. Not eligible for programming. 1 DA Surcharge.

14CF876:
Ct. 1 (Sex Registry Violation)>> 4 Years and 2 months WSPS- 14 months IC and 3 years ES. To run concurrent to each other and to the recvocation sentences currently being served. CONDITIONS: Court Costs, No objection to having contact with Victim S.M. while in prison and on ES. Not eligible for programming.

14CM1774: 
Ct. 1 (Theft-Movable Property-Repeater)>> 2 years WSPS - 1 year IC and 1 year ES. To run concurrent to each other and to the recvocation sentences currently being served. CONDITIONS: $575 in Restitution to be paid while on ES. Court Costs. No objection to having contact with Victim S.M. while in prison and on ES. Not eligible for programming.
